html:
V. Dorsett

Breaking conventions, one piece at a time. A showcase of asymmetrical beauty.
css: .asym-grid-gallery-section { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; padding: 2rem; background-color: #1A1A1A; } .asym-grid-gallery-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr); grid-template-rows: repeat(3, 25vh); gap: 1rem; } .asym-grid-gallery-item { overflow: hidden; border-radius: 8px; } .asym-grid-gallery-item img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .asym-grid-gallery-text-item { grid-column: 1 / 3; grid-row: 1 / 2; background-color: #F8F9FA; color: #212529; display: flex; align-items: center; padding: 2rem; } .asym-grid-gallery-text-wrapper h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin: 0 0 1rem; } .asym-grid-gallery-text-wrapper p { font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.5; } .asym-grid-gallery-item-1 { grid-column: 3 / 5; grid-row: 1 / 3; } .asym-grid-gallery-item-2 { grid-column: 1 / 2; grid-row: 2 / 4; } .asym-grid-gallery-item-3 { grid-column: 2 / 3; grid-row: 2 / 3; } .asym-grid-gallery-item-4 { grid-column: 2 / 5; grid-row: 3 / 4; } @media (max-width: 992px) { .asym-grid-gallery-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); grid-template-rows: auto; } .asym-grid-gallery-item { grid-column: auto !important; grid-row: auto !important; min-height: 300px; } .asym-grid-gallery-text-item { min-height: auto; } } @media (max-width: 576px) { .asym-grid-gallery-section { padding: 1rem; } .asym-grid-gallery-grid { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .asym-grid-gallery-text-item { order: -1; } .asym-grid-gallery-text-wrapper h1 { font-size: 2rem; } }
js: window.addEventListener('load', () => { document.querySelectorAll('img[src^="https://pixabay.com/api/"]').forEach(img => { fetch(img.src).then(response => response.json()).then(data => { if (data.hits && data.hits.length > 0) { img.src = data.hits[0].largeImageURL; } else { img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; } }).catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching Pixabay image:', error); img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; }); }); });
